item.description:
Welcome to HANA Japanese Steakhouse and Sushi Bar in Waterbury...a great new venue for Japanese food lovers! 

 

At HANA, culinary artistry meets modern design. The master hibachi chefs will amaze you with their performance, while the savory dishes will excite your taste buds.

 

From the fire of the hibachi, to the exquisite sushi and traditional favorites, this is the restaurant for all your senses! So please join us for a very special night of superb food and great company. Check out this menu...

http://www.hanawaterbury.com/#/home
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: HANA Japanese Steakhouse and Sushi Bar...
